I just came across this info ---starting this week there's going to be
an Asian Film Fest in New York City and as far as I'm concerned the
start attraction is When the Last Sword is Drawn a/k/a/
Mibugishiden......More info at website below. Tickets are only $8 in
advance $9 on the spot...*sigh*

http://www.subwaycinema.com/frames/nyaff04home.htm

Someone go, & sigh wistfully over a Big Screen Koichi Sato for me
since I can't get there...and find out the name of the guy who plays
Nagakura while you're at it...



Barb Sheridan
